Tuni dong hih hun saupi sung na sanggamte uh na nusia kei uh a,Topana Pasian uh hong sawlna limtakin zuih ding na ngaihsun uh hi.Topa

Tu-inTopana Pasian un amaute tungah a ciamsa bangin na sanggamte uh tawlngakna pia hi. Tua ahih cianginTopa’nasem Moses in note hong piak Jordan galkhat, note’ neihsa a omna leitang na inn uhah note ciah un.TopaTopa’

Topa’nasem Moses in note hong piak thupiakna le thukham ahi,Topana Pasian uh it ding, ama lampi khempeuh zuih ding, ama thupiakte zuih ding, amah belh ding le na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep ding uh limtakin ngaihsun un,” a ci hi.Topa’Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in amaute thupha pia-in ciahsak a, amaute zong a inn ciat uhah a ciah uh hi.

Tu-in Manasseh minam alangte tungah Moses in Jordan nisuahna lam Bashan gam sungah neihsa pia khin hi. Ahi zongin Joshua in alangte tungah Jordan nitumna lam a sanggamte kiang uhah neihsa a pia hi. Joshua in amaute a inn uhah sawlin thupha a piak ciangin
amaute tungah, “Na inn uhah hauhna lianpi, ganhing tampi tak, ngun, kham, sumngo, sik le puan tampi tawh ciahkik un. Na galte uh van na suhte uh na sanggamte uh tawh hawm un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte, Moses tungtawninTopa’thupiakna tawh a neih uh amau’ leitang ahi Gilead gamah a pai dingin Kanaan gam sunga om Shiloh munah Israel mite tawh kikhenin a inn uhah a ciah uh hi.Topa’
Kanaan gam sunga om Jordan gam kiim teng a tun uh ciangin Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte in tua lai Jordan gun kiangah a lian mahmah biakna tau khat a lam uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in, “En un, Israel mite’ lampang, Jordan kiim gam, Kanaan gam nawlah Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte in biakna tau khat lam uh hi,” a kicihna za uh hi.
Israel mite in tua thu a zak uh ciangin amaute a do dingin Israel mihon buppi khempeuh Shiloh-ah kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Gilead gam a om Reuben mite, Gad mite, le Manasseh minam alangte kiangah siampi Eleazar tapa Finehas,
le amah tawh ukpi sawm, Israel minam innkuan panin khat ciat, Israel behte lakah innkuan lutang ahite a sawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gilead gam sunga om Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte kiangah va pai-in amaute kiangah,

“Topa’mihon buppi in, ‘Topalehdona-ah tuni-in note adingin biakna tau khat lamna tawhTopazuihna panin tuni-in kihei-in Israel Pasian’ tungah na gamtatnasa uh ahi hih khemna pen bang ahi hiam?Topa’TopaTopa

Topa’mihonte tungah gimna khat a hong tungsak ahi, eite i kisiansuah nai beek lohna ahi, Peor-a i khialhna hawmthawhin, tuni-inTopazuihna panin kihei khia ding na hi uh hiam? Note in tuni-inTopalehdo le-uhcin zing ciangin Israel mihon buppi tungah amah heh ding hi.Topa’TopaTopa

Ahih hangin tu-in note’ lak na leitang uh nin ahihlehTopa’biakbuk a dinna munTopa’leitangah hong pai unla, kote’ lakah luah hong nei un.Topalehdo kei unla,Topai Pasian’ biakna tau sim loh note ading biakna tau na lamna uh tawh kote a lehdo hong suaksak kei un.Topa’Topa’TopaTopa
Zerah’ tapa Akhan, a ki-ap nate-ah a khialh manin Israel mihon khempeuh tungah hehna hong tung hi lo ahi hiam? Ama mawhna hangin amah bek si lo hi,’ ci uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte in Israel beh lutangte dawngin,

“A Vanglian Pa, Pasian,Topa!A Vanglian Pa, Pasian,Topa!Amah in thei hi. Israel mahmah in zong thei tahen! Lehdona ahi a,Topa’tungah thuman lohna ahi zongin ahih a,Topazuihna panin a pial dingin biakna tau lam ka hih uhleh, tuni-in kote hong zah kei hen. Tua ahih kei leh zong, tua tungah meihal biakna ahi a, an tawh biakna ahi a, thunuama biakna ahi zongin piak nadingin a lam ka hih uhlehTopamahmah in hong thuk tahen.Topa!Topa!Topa’TopaTopa
Tua bang hi hetlo hi. Hong tung ding hunte-ah na tate un ko’ tate tungah, ‘Israel Pasian,Topatawh no bang kisai na hi uh hiam?Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh no Reuben mite le Gad mite le ko’ kikalahTopain gamgi-in Jordan bawl khinzo hi.Topa’sungah no tanh bangmah om lo hi,’ a cihkhak ding uh launa tawh ka bawl uh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka tate unTopaa biak ding uh na tate un khaktan kha ding uh hi.TopaTopa’Topa

Tua ahih ciangin kote in, ‘Meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiakna ding ahi zongin hi loin, ama omna-ah ka meihal biaknate uh le ka biakpiaknate uh le thunuama ka piaknate uh tawhTopa’na ka sepna uh kote le note’ kikal le ko’ khit ciangin i suanlekhakte kikalah teci dingin bawl ni. Tua bang hikeileh hong tung ding hunte-ah na tate un ko’ tate tungah, “Topa’sungah no’ tanh bangmah om lo hi,” ci kha ding uh hi,’ ka ci uh hi.Topa’Topa’

Tua ahih ciangin hong tung ding hunte-ah kote tung ahi a, kote’ suanlekhakte’ tungah ahi zongin hih bangin hong kicih leh, ‘Meihal biak nading ahi a, biakpiak nading ahi zongin hi loin note le kote kikalah teci dingin ka pu ka pate un a bawlTopa’biakna tau lim en un,’ i ci ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun uh hi.Topa’

Ama biakbuk mai-a omTopaka Pasian uh biakna tau longal, meihal biakna ahi a, an tawh biakna ahi a, biakpiak nading lamna tawh ahi zongin kote inTopalehdo-inTopazuihna panin a pial ka hi het kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.TopaTopaTopa
Siampi Finehas le amah tawh a om mihon ukpi, Israel beh lutangte in Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh mite’ thugenna a zak uh ciangin tua thugennate in amaute lungkimsak mahmah hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh mite tungah, “Topatungah note zuautat nai lo na hih manun eite’ lakahTopaom hi, ci-in tuni-in i thei hi. Tu-in note inTopa’gimpiak nading panin Israel mite na hon khia uh hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopaTopa’
Tua ciangin siampi Eleazar’ tapa Finehas le ukpite, Gilead gam a om Reuben mite le Gad mite kiang panin Israel mite’ omna Kanaan gamah ciahkik uh a, amaute tungah thu puakkik uh hi.
Tua thu in Israel mite lungkimsak hi. Israel mite in Pasian phat uh a, Reuben mite le Gad mite a tenna leitang susia-in amaute galin do ding gen nawn lo uh hi.
Reuben mite le Gad mite in a biakna tau uh min dingin “Teci” a phuak uh hi. “Bang hang hiam cih lehTopapen Pasian ahihna thu eite’ kikalah teci ahi hi,” amaute in ci uh hi.Topa
Topain amau’ kiima om gal khempeuh panin Israel mite tungah lungmuanna a piak khit a sawtpi ciangin Joshua teekin a kum tampi pha ta hi.Topa
Joshua in Israel khempeuh, a upate le a lutangte, a thukhente le a uliante uh samin amaute kiangah, “Tu-in kei teekin ka kum tampi pha ta hi.
Note’ hanginTopana Pasian un hih minam dangte khempeuh tungah a bawlnate na mu khin uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note adingin hong dosak pa penTopana Pasian uh ahi hi.TopaTopa
En un, Jordan panin nitumna lama Tuipi Lian dong, a omlai minamte pen ka zawhsa minamte tawh na minamte uh gamh dingin note tungah kong pia khin hi.
Topana Pasian un note’ mai-ah amaute lehnawt dinga, note’ muhna panin hawl khia ding hi.Topana Pasian un note’ tungah hong ciam bangin amau’ gam na luah ding uh hi.TopaTopa

Tua ahih ciangin note lakah a omlai hih minamte tawh kihel loin, amau’ pasian-te’ thu zong gen loin, tuate tawh zong kiciam loin, amau’ na sem loin, amaute’ mai-ah zong note kun loin, ahih hangin tuni-a na gamtat bangunTopana Pasian uh na belh theih nadingun Moses’ thukham laibu sunga kigelhte khempeuh zui-in semin, themkhat zong pial loin na om nadingun khauhtakin om un.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain note’ mai-ah a lian a thahat minamte hawl khia a, note na hih uhleh tuni dongin mi khat beek in hong nang zo nai lo hi.Topa
Note tungah hong ciamsa bangin note adingin hong dosak pa penTopana Pasian uh ahih manin note khat in mi tulkhat na taikeeksak zo uh hi.Topa
Tua ahih cianginTopana Pasian uh na it ding uh hoihtakin ngaihsun un.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh note nungkikin note lakah a omlai minamte tawh kipawlin amaute tawh kiteengin, note in amau’ numeite teenpihin amaute in note’ numeite a teenpih leh,

Topana Pasian un note’ mai-ah hih minamte hawl khia nawn lo ding hi, ci-in teltakin thei un.Topana Pasian un note hong piak hih leitang hoih panin na sih khit matengun amaute pen note adingin thangzak le tehlop, na nung uh a hong sat ciangduai, ahih kei leh na mit sung uh a hong sun ling tawh kibang ding uh hi.TopaTopa

“Tu-in leitung mi khempeuh ngeina bangin kei a pai ding ka hi ta a, note khempeuh in na lungsim uh le na nuntakna uhah,Topana Pasian un note tawh kisai na hoih hong ciam khempeuh khat zong maimawk lo ahihna na thei uh hi. A vekpi-in note adingin hong tangtung a, khat zong maimawk lo hi.Topa

Ahih hangin, amah in note hong thupiak ahiTopana Pasian uh thuciamna palsatin, note in pasian dangte’ na semin tuate na biak uhleh,Topana Pasian un note tawh kisai-in a ciam na hoih khempeuh a tun mah banginTopana Pasian un note hong piaksa hih leitang hoih panin amah in note hong suksiat khit matengin note tungah siatna khempeuh hong tungsak ding hi. Note tungahTopahong sinso dinga, note tungah a hong piak leitang hoih panin note manlang takin na bei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopaTopaTopa
Tua ciangin Joshua in Israel minam khempeuh Shekhem-ah kaikhawmin a upate, a makaite, a thukhente le Israel uliante a sam hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ mai-ah amau ciat kipia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in mi khempeuh tungah, “Israel Pasian,Topain hih bangin thu gen a, ‘Tanglai-in Eufratis gun galkhat ah na pu na pate uh teng ngei a, tuate lakah Abraham le Nahor’ pa Terah pen khat bek ahi hi. Na pu na pate un pasian dangte bia uh hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Gun gal panin na pu uh Abraham la-in Kanaan gam khempeuh ah ka paipih a, a suanlekhakte tampi ka phasak hi. Ama tungah Isaac ka pia a,
Isaac tungah Jakob le Esau ka pia hi. A neih dingin Seir mual tung gam Esau ka pia a, ahih hangin Jakob le a tate Egypt-ah a paisuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses le Aaron ka sawl a, a gam sunga ka sepnate tawh Egypt ka gimsak khit ciangin note kong pai khiatpih hi.
Egypt panin na pu na pate uh ka pai khiatpih a, tuipi a tung uh hi. Egypt mite in leeng le sakol tung tuangte tawh na pu na pate uh San Tuipi-ah delh uh hi.

Kei tungah amaute hong kiko uh ciangin amaute le Egypt mite kikalah khuamial ka koih a, Egypt mite tungah tuipi luangsakin amaute ka tuumsak hi. Egypt tungah ka bawlna na thei uh a, sehnel gam sungah sauveipi na om uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jordan galkhat ah a teeng Amor mite’ leitangah note kong paipih hi. Amaute in note hong do-in, note’ khut sungah amaute kong pia a, note in amau’ leitang na luah uh a, note’ mai-ah amaute ka susia hi.
Tua ciangin Moab kumpipa, Zippor’ tapa Balak hong khangin Israel mite hong do hi. Amah in mi sawlin note hong samsia dingin Beor’ tapa Balaam a samsak hi.
Ahih hangin Balaam’ thu ka ngai kei hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in note thupha hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin Balak’ khut sung panin note kong hon khia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jordan galkhat ah pai-in Jerikho na tung uh a, Jerikho mite in note hong do uh hi. Amor mite, Perez mite, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Girgash mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite in zong note hong do uh a, ahi zongin note’ khut sungah amaute kong pia hi.
Amor kumpi nihte note mai-ah a hawl khia tunpite keimah in note mai-ah ka sawl hi. Tua pen note’ namsau ahi a, note’ thal tawh ahi zongin na dona hang uh hi lo hi.
Note in na sep loh uh leitang, na sat loh uh khuapite, note tungah kong pia a, tuate sungah na teeng uh hi. Na suan loh uh leenggui lo pan a gah leh oliv huan pan a gah na ne uh hi,’ ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin tu-inTopazahtak unla, lungsim tak le thumanna tawh ama na sem un. Na pu na pate un Gun gal le Egypt gam sungah a biak uh pasian-te koih khia unla,Topa’na sem un.TopaTopa’

Topa’na na sepnop kei uhleh, Gun galkhat a a na na sepsak uh na pu na pate uh pasian ahi a, note’ tenna gam Amor mite’ pasian ahi zongin, a na na sepsak ding peuhpeuh uh tuni-in teel un. Ahih hangin kei le ka innkuanpihte in ahihlehTopa’na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’Topa’
Tua ciangin mite in dawngin, “Adang pasian-te’ na a sem dinginTopanusiat ding ka ngaihsun ngei kei ding uh hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh salsuahna Egypt gam panin eite le i pu i pate a hong pai khiatpih, eite’ muhna-ah tua lim liante a bawl, i paina lampi khempeuh le i nawk mite khempeuh lakah hong kem pa penTopai Pasian ahi hi.Topa
Topain eite’ mai-ah tua gam a teeng Amor mite khempeuh hawl khia hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pen eite’ Pasian ahih manin kote in zongTopa’na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.TopaTopa’

Ahih hangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Topa’na na sem zo kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen a siangtho Pasian hi a, a aam Pasian zong ahi hi. Note’ thupalsatna ahi a, na khialhna uh ahi zongin hong maisak lo ding hi.Topa’
Topanusia-in gamdang pasian-te’ na na sep uhleh, note tungah a hoih hong bawl khit ciangin amah hong kihei-in note’ tungah siatna hong bawlin note hong beisak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin mite in Joshua kiangah, “Hilo hi;Topa’na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Ama na a sem dinginTopana teel khitna uhah note adingin note mah teci na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kote, teci ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Amah in, “Tua ahihleh note’ lakah a om gamdang pasian-te koih khia unla, Israel Pasian,Topa’lamah na lungsim uh nga un,” a ci hi.Topa’
Mite in Joshua kiangah, “Topai Pasian’ na ka sem ding uh a, ama thu ka mang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in Shekhem-ah tua ni-in mite tawh thuciamna bawl a, amaute adingin thukham le biakna ngeina kipte a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Pasian’ thukham laibu sungah hih kammalte a gelh hi. Amah in suangtum lianpi khat la-inTopabiakna mun tawsaw nuai-ah a phut hi.Topa

Tua ciangin Joshua in mi khempeuh kiangah, “En un, hih suangtum pen eite’ langkhat ah teci hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain eite tungah hong thugen khempeuh hih suangtum in za khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin note, na Pasian uh tungah a man loin na gamtat loh nadingun hih suangtum pen note’ langkhat ah teci hi ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in a milipin amau’ gamh ciatah, mite a ciahsak hi.
Hih thute khit cianginTopa’nasem, Nun’ tapa Joshua si a, a khan kum za le kum sawmkhat a pha hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amaute in Gaash mual leilu lam, Efraim mual tung gam a om Timnathserah mun a ama gamhluah leitangah a vui uh hi.
Joshua’ khang sung le Joshua sangin sau a nungta zaw upate khempeuh khang sungin Israel mite inTopa’na sem a, Israel mite adinginTopain a sep na khempeuh a thei uh hi.Topa’Topa

Israel mite in Egypt panin a puak uh Josef’ guhte pen Shekhem’ pa Hamor’ tapate tung panin Jakob in dangka zakhat tawh a lei Shekhem leitangah kivui a, tua leitang pen Josef’ suanlekhakte’ luah a suak hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron’ tapa Eleazar a si hi. Amaute in Efraim mual tung gam sunga a om, ama tapa Finehas tungah a kipia Gibeah khua-ah a vui uh hi.
